name: Laravel
title: React JS Live Course
details: Laravel is a web application framework. A popular framework for PHP is Laravel. Using the Laravel framework saves a lot of time in developing web applications, eliminates the hassle of repetitive code creation, and allows for faster application development. It has become mandatory for a PHP developer to know the Laravel framework to work in the current job market. HTML, PHP, SQL and Object-oriented programming (OOP) If you have an idea about it, you can participate in the Laravel course.

name: Website Development
title: Web Development Live Course
details: One of the popular professions nowadays is web development. Web Development Basically, the process of creating websites, web applications for the Internet using various scripting and programming languages ​​is called web development. Those who have basic knowledge of HTML CSS or web design can start web development course.

name: UI/UX Design
title: Professional UI/UX Design Live Course
details: UI Design is the graphical interface that is created for any device (mobile/computer) screen such as website, mobile app, software etc. When a user visits a website or software with a specific goal in mind, UX design is all about working on things so that he can achieve his goal from there. If they have a basic understanding of design, they can start a career with UI/UX design.

name: Social Media
title: Social Media Marketing Marketing Live Course
details: There are many ways to promote your website, product, service or any topic online, among which social media marketing is a very simple and effective way to promote your website easily. The main objective of social media marketing is to fulfill marketing goals by increasing their own promotion on various platforms such as: Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, LinkedIn, Pinterest and various other targeted social media.

name: SEO
title: Search Engine Optimization-SEO
details: SEO, whose full name is Search Engine Optimization. Search engines are the sites through which we search for various information on the website. Like Google, Bing etc. For example, if we search on Google with online courses, what will come up? It will come that, the information of all the companies that conduct online courses from Bangladesh. Now there are many companies in Bangladesh who offer online courses, so who will Google bring first? All that needs to be done to get to the first page of Google is search engine optimization.

name: Ecommerce Business
title: Ecommerce Business Development
details: The business that takes place using the Internet is called E-Commerce or Electronic Commerce. E-commerce (e-commerce). E-commerce is the modern data processing and computer-based network system, especially the marketing of goods or services between individuals or organizations, buying and selling, buying and selling, business transactions etc. through the Internet. You can do this course only if you know computer basics.
